bibl.title: A Papyrus Scrap of Menander's "Sunaristosai"?
bibl.note: P. Baden VI, 175 (= Pack2 1639; C.G.F.P., fr. 265). The links are sufficient in number and in detail to make the identification of the papyrus scrap as Menander's "Sunaristosai" highly probable.
bibl.seg: Arnott W. Geoffrey, A Papyrus Scrap of Menander's "Sunaristosai"?
P. Baden VI, 175 (= Pack2 1639; C.G.F.P., fr. 265). The links are sufficient in number and in detail to make the identification of the papyrus scrap as Menander's "Sunaristosai" highly probable.
